title: Soul Speed
desc:
Post 1821
- When you play this card, if there is no instance of (1819) Soul Sand nor (1820) Soul Soil in the <:builder:1119843481700012103> pile or anyone's hand, a random player will draw one of those cards.
- **Anybody who stands on (1819) Soul Sand or (1820) Soul Soil may play a second card each turn.**
